name: Silliman Family Aquatic Center
short_desc: Offers an activity pool, 25-yard four-lane lap pool, 245' Lazy River, 12-person warm-water spa, waterslides, and the Otter Alley Cafe
description: Offers lap swim, rec swim, swim lessons, water aerobics, features an activity pool, 25-yard four-lane lap pool, 245' Lazy River, 12-person warm-water spa, waterslides, and the Otter Alley Cafe. Pool hours change each season, see www.newark.org/facilities.html for more information and link to current schedule.
